name: Star Quest (SouthernSpade)
description:
Welcome to the long-awaited RPG!

Thanks to everyone who support my last release! Feel free to play Awesome Platformer after downloading and enjoying this game.

This is the just the demo of the full adventure in development. Comment to your heart's desires! 

  • Let me know what you liked
  • Let me know what you disliked
  • Let me know of any problems you encounter
  • Let me know what you want to see implemented in the full version!

Of course the demo is free and feel free to show support! 

----------------------------------- Controls -----------------------------------

Movement: Arrows

Dash: Space

Attack: C

Arrows: V

Shield: X

Interact: E

Find all of the star pieces scattered across the land!
